Package com.hexanome16.client.screens.game

Class PurchaseMap

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.client.screens.game.PriceMap
com.hexanome16.client.screens.game.PurchaseMap
public class PurchaseMap extends PriceMap
Class responsible for representing the gems the player decided to put down to buy a card.

    • PurchaseMap

      public PurchaseMap(int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount)
      Instantiates a new Purchase map.
      Parameters:
      rubyAmount - the amount of ruby tokens
      emeraldAmount - the amount of emerald tokens
      sapphireAmount - the amount of sapphire tokens
      diamondAmount - the amount of diamond tokens
      onyxAmount - the amount of onyx tokens
      goldAmount - the amount of gold tokens

  • Method Details

    • toPurchaseMap

      public static PurchaseMap toPurchaseMap(PriceMap paPriceMap)
      Makes a purchase map out of the input price map, sets gold amount in the new purchase map to be 0.
      Parameters:
      paPriceMap - PriceMap we want to transform.
      Returns:
      a PurchaseMap with the same amount of each gem as the inputted price map.

    • getGoldAmount

      public int getGoldAmount()
      Gets amount of gold tokens.
      Returns:
      the gold amount

      Returns the sum of non-gold tokens.
      Returns:
      the sum of non-gold tokens

    • canBeUsedToBuy

      public boolean canBeUsedToBuy(Object otherPriceMap)
      Checks if implied argument can be used instead of the parameter to commit a purchase.
      Parameters:
      otherPriceMap - priceMap we want to compare to.
      Returns:
      true if the implied can be used to commit the purchase, false otherwise.
